pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ChatCreate a mattermost chat for discussing superevents.## UsageThis current version uses a superevent_id informationto make mattermost channels. It only works if the .netrc file has a "mattermost-bot" login with appropiate token as password. If the channel creation succeedes, the new channel name will be `RRT O4 {superevent_id}`. A post will be made in this channel with a corresponding grace_db url. Raises exceptions in case of failures.```from ligo.rrt_chat import channel_creationimport jsonchannel_creation.rrt_channel_creation(superevent_id, gracedb_url)```
